head:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0">
<xsl:output method="html" version="4.0" doctype-public="-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN" doctype-system="http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd" />
<xsl:template match="/">
averagewaitingtime:
<xsl:variable name="!NAME!_AWT_WG_!INDEX!">
<xsl:choose>
<xsl:when test="//ININ.People.WorkgroupStats_Workgroup[@name=$!NAME!_WG_!INDEX!]/ININ.Queue_Interval[@name = $WORKGROUP_INTERVAL]/ININ.Workgroup_TotalWaitTime = 'N/A'">00:00:00</xsl:when>
<xsl:otherwise><xsl:value-of select="//ININ.People.WorkgroupStats_Workgroup[@name=$!NAME!_WG_!INDEX!]/ININ.Queue_Interval[@name = $WORKGROUP_INTERVAL]/ININ.Workgroup_TotalWaitTime" /></xsl:otherwise>
</xsl:choose>
</xsl:variable>
<xsl:variable name="!NAME!_AWT_WG_!INDEX!_s" select="substring($!NAME!_AWT_WG_!INDEX!, 7, 2)" />
<xsl:variable name="!NAME!_AWT_WG_!INDEX!_m" select="substring($!NAME!_AWT_WG_!INDEX!, 4, 2) * 60" />
<xsl:variable name="!NAME!_AWT_WG_!INDEX!_h" select="substring($!NAME!_AWT_WG_!INDEX!, 1, 2) * 3600" />
<xsl:variable name="!NAME!_AWT_!INDEX!" select="round($!NAME!_AWT_WG_!INDEX!_s + $!NAME!_AWT_WG_!INDEX!_m + $!NAME!_AWT_WG_!INDEX!_h) div $!NAME!_ANSWERED_WG_!INDEX!" />
<xsl:variable name="!NAME!_AWT_h_!INDEX!" select="format-number(floor($!NAME!_AWT_!INDEX! div 3600), '00')" />
<xsl:variable name="!NAME!_AWT_m_!INDEX!" select="format-number(floor($!NAME!_AWT_!INDEX! mod 3600 div 60), ':00')" />
<xsl:variable name="!NAME!_AWT_s_!INDEX!" select="format-number($!NAME!_AWT_!INDEX! mod 3600 mod 60, ':00')" />
averageconversationtime:
<xsl:variable name="!NAME!_ACT_WG_!INDEX!">
<xsl:choose>
<xsl:when test="//ININ.People.WorkgroupStats_Workgroup[@name=$!NAME!_WG_!INDEX!]/ININ.Queue_Interval[@name = $WORKGROUP_INTERVAL]/ININ.Workgroup_TotalTalkTime = 'N/A'">00:00:00</xsl:when>
<xsl:otherwise><xsl:value-of select="//ININ.People.WorkgroupStats_Workgroup[@name=$!NAME!_WG_!INDEX!]/ININ.Queue_Interval[@name = $WORKGROUP_INTERVAL]/ININ.Workgroup_TotalTalkTime" /></xsl:otherwise>
</xsl:choose>
</xsl:variable>
<xsl:variable name="!NAME!_ACT_WG_!INDEX!_s" select="substring($!NAME!_ACT_WG_!INDEX!, 7, 2)" />
<xsl:variable name="!NAME!_ACT_WG_!INDEX!_m" select="substring($!NAME!_ACT_WG_!INDEX!, 4, 2) * 60" />
<xsl:variable name="!NAME!_ACT_WG_!INDEX!_h" select="substring($!NAME!_ACT_WG_!INDEX!, 1, 2) * 3600" />
<xsl:variable name="!NAME!_ACT_!INDEX!" select="round($!NAME!_ACT_WG_!INDEX!_s + $!NAME!_ACT_WG_!INDEX!_m + $!NAME!_ACT_WG_!INDEX!_h) div $!NAME!_ANSWERED_WG_!INDEX!" />
<xsl:variable name="!NAME!_ACT_h_!INDEX!" select="format-number(floor($!NAME!_ACT_!INDEX! div 3600), '00')" />
<xsl:variable name="!NAME!_ACT_m_!INDEX!" select="format-number(floor($!NAME!_ACT_!INDEX! mod 3600 div 60), ':00')" />
<xsl:variable name="!NAME!_ACT_s_!INDEX!" select="format-number($!NAME!_ACT_!INDEX! mod 3600 mod 60, ':00')" />
